meanings.sent1: The colorful titis chirped happily in the tree.

meanings.definition: A type of inflammation of the breast
meanings.sent1: She went to the doctor for treatment of titis in her breast.
meanings.sent2: The nurse explained the symptoms of titis in detail.
meanings.sent3: Despite the discomfort, she joked about her titis to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: The titis in her breast felt like a hot, painful lump.

meanings.definition: A type of inflammation of the eyelids
meanings.sent1: His red, swollen eyelids indicated a case of titis.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended eye drops to treat the titis.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't stop blinking due to the irritating titis.
meanings.sent4: The titis in his eyelids made it hard for him to see clearly.
meanings.sent5: The itching sensation from the titis was unbearable.
